item.title: linux route basic tutorial
item.author: qianz
item.description: ip rule and ip route the packet is first matched against ip rules and then directed to specific ip table to match ip route rules 1 2 3 4 5 ip rule # output # 0: from all lookup local # 32766: from all lookup main # 32767: from all lookup default these three rules are created by the kernel the number is the matching priority from all means all packets
